Posts.Content: hi i'm 20 years old and i found a lump in my breast. i check my breasts regularly and i can only feel it while laying down with my left arm raised and it hurts a bit when i touch it. i know it could be nothing and i'm going to the doctor to get it checked out. i was just wondering if it's common to get lumps in your breasts like before your periods maybe? and if so, how long do they stay there if they're not cancerous?
Posts.Title: a lump in my breast
